Key Match Events: KL Rahul's direct hit to get rid of Liton Das
Post-Match Reflections: Liton Das's run-out was the turning point of the match
Bangladesh fans were on the edge of their seats hoping to see their men come up trumps
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Adelaide Oval during the T20 World Cup 2022
India beat Bangladesh by 5 runs (DLS Method)
Others: MS Dhoni's presence of mind helped India snatch victory from the jaws of defeat in a similar situation six years ago
